import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./TransactionLog.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TransactionLog(){const[transactions,setTransactions]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:5000/transactions").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setTransactions(data)).catch(err=>console.error("Error fetching transactions:",err));},[]);const handleDelete=id=>{fetch("http://localhost:5000/transactions/".concat(id),{method:"DELETE"}).then(()=>{// Update the state after deletion
setTransactions(prev=>prev.filter(item=>item.id!==id));}).catch(err=>console.error("Delete failed:",err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"transaction-log-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Transaction Log"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"transaction-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"From"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"To"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Amount"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Currency"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Comment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:transactions.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:"6",className:"no-transactions",children:"No transactions found."})}):transactions.map(tx=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:tx.account_From}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:tx.account_To}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:tx.convertedAmount}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:tx.currency}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:tx.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:tx.comment}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:()=>handleDelete(tx.id),children:"Delete"})]},tx.id))})]})]});}
